Core - base class for pymtÂ¶

  • geometric - utility for 3D mesh handling
  • graphx - generic drawing functions
  • gesture - gesture recognition
  • loader - asynchronous way to load image
  • mtpyglet - multitouch abstraction for pyglet
  • obj - handle 3D mesh
  • plugin - pymt plugin architecture
  • shader - abstraction to handle shader
  • vector - generic vector class
